experience.title: Corporate Trainer
experience.description: This company worked as an outsourcing unit for various blue chip clients in the service industry. The client represented by me was 'Save the Children'. It involved B2B/B2C/B2G professional fundraising. Fast paced growth and profit sharing were the standouts.

experience.title: Business Development Executive
experience.description: Client acquisition and relationship development has been the central objective of the company followed by initiative to maintain this relationship. The work process mainly is focused on the education sector by providing improved quality in services and products. Quikfee is an online fee collection and management platform dedicated to the educational institutions in the country. My role was to identify potential partners and convert them into business. All the while maintaining the image and the value of the company.
